Getting help
------------

Having trouble? We'd like to help!

- Looking for specific information? Try the :ref:`genindex` or :ref:`modindex`.
- Report bugs with logginginitializer in our `issue tracker <https://gitlab.com/rwsdatalab/codebase/utils/logging-initializer/-/issues>`_.
- See this document as `pdf <logginginitializer.pdf>`_.
